Opcode.Message: Info
Opcode.Name: win:Info

Opcode.Message: This event is raised during the connection process
Opcode.Name: Connect

Opcode.Message: This event is raised during the disconnection process
Opcode.Name: Disconnect

Opcode.Message: This event is raised during the authentication process
Opcode.Name: Authenticate

Opcode.Message: This event is raised while trying to automatically reconnect to the server
Opcode.Name: Autoreconnect

Opcode.Message: This event is raised during resolving the server name
Opcode.Name: ResolveName

Opcode.Message: This event is raised while trying to get a valid license
Opcode.Name: License

Opcode.Message: This event is raised in the gateway transport
Opcode.Name: Gateway

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when data is received from the server
Opcode.Name: RecvServerData

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when data is sent to the server
Opcode.Name: SendClientData

Opcode.Message: This event is raised during a state transition.
Opcode.Name: StateTransition

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when the client has not been shutdown cleanly.
Opcode.Name: RadcCancelDuringExit

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when the user tries to sign out from the OOB client.
Opcode.Name: RadcUserSignOut

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when the user manually tries to do feed refresh.
Opcode.Name: RadcWorkspaceRefresh

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when the user tries to login in ADAL page using different user name.
Opcode.Name: RadcAdalDifferentUserError

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when a workspace event like subscribe/update succeeded.
Opcode.Name: RadcWorkspaceEventSuccess

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when a workspace event like subscribe/update failed!
Opcode.Name: RadcWorkspaceEventFailure

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when feed discovery succeeds
Opcode.Name: RadcDiscoverySuccess

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when feed discovery failed!
Opcode.Name: RadcDiscoveryFailure

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when the feed cache on the client local machine is missing icons or Rdp files due to cache corruption!
Opcode.Name: RadcCacheCorruption

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when user has successfully updated the consent status on server side
Opcode.Name: RadcConsentStatusUpdateSuccess

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when user is unable to update the consent status on server!
Opcode.Name: RadcConsentStatusUpdateFailure

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when the client first launches.
Opcode.Name: RadcClientVersion

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when the user manually clicks the view invitations button.
Opcode.Name: RadcViewInvites

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when the user starts a new cycle of feed discovery. We log the hashed UPN and timezone information here
Opcode.Name: RadcUserTimeZone

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when all the feeds of the user have been subscribed or updated completely. We log the overall time it took to download all feeds in parallel.
Opcode.Name: RadcRefreshTime

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when there is a close operation which will tear down the connection.
Opcode.Name: CloseEvent

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when protocol caps are received from the server. We log the version selected, and the client mode and AVC capability.
Opcode.Name: ClientPipelineProtocolRevision

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when protocol caps are received from the server. We log that hardware resources are being used.
Opcode.Name: ClientPipelineFrameHWMemory

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when protocol caps are received from the server. We log that hardware resources are not being used.
Opcode.Name: ClientPipelineFrameSWMemory

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when there is error in acquiring ADAL token.
Opcode.Name: RadcDetailedAdalError

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when ADAL authentication token is successfully created.
Opcode.Name: RadcAdalTokenCollected

Opcode.Message: This event is raised when ADAL authentication is cancelled.
Opcode.Name: RadcAdalCancelled

Opcode.Message: This event is raised if a pipeline error is encountered during execution. We log the faulting component, function, and error code.
Opcode.Name: ClientPipelineError

Opcode.Message: This is a generic event that may be raised by the client.
Opcode.Name: GenericClientEvent

Opcode.Message: This is a generic error that may be signaled by the client.
Opcode.Name: GenericClientError

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during a state transition.
Event.Message: %1: Transitioned successfully from %3 to %5 in response to %7.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StateTransitionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PreviousState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PreviousStateName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewStateName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Event" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="EventName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during a state transition.
Event.Message: %1: An error was encountered when transitioning from %3 to %5 in response to %7 (error code %8).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StateTransitionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PreviousState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PreviousStateName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewStateName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Event" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="EventName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during a state transition.
Event.Message: %1: MCS Channel Join Confirmation received: ChannelID = %2, ChannelName = %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StateTransitionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ChannelID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ChannelName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Function" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Line" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DebugMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX is trying to connect to the server (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX has connected to the server

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the disconnection process
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX has been disconnected (Reason= %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: Client has logged on to the server (SessionId = %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: Client failed to logon on to the server (Error = %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised while trying to automatically reconnect to the server
Event.Message: Client machine has lost network connectivity (Reason= %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during resolving the server name
Event.Message: DNS failed to resolve the server name (Error= %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the authentication process
Event.Message: The credentials provided are authenticated by the server
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the authentication process
Event.Message: The credentials provided were failed to be authenticated by the server
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised in the gateway transport
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX is connecting to a gateway server (%1=%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised in the gateway transport
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX succeeded in connecting to the gateway server

Event.Opcode: This event is raised in the gateway transport
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX failed to connect to the gateway server(Error= %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised while trying to automatically reconnect to the server
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX is trying to automatically reconnect to the server (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised while trying to automatically reconnect to the server
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX succeeded in automatically connecting to the server
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised while trying to automatically reconnect to the server
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX failed to automatically connect to the server (Reason= %1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised while trying to get a valid license
Event.Message: Client has a license to connect to the server
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised while trying to get a valid license
Event.Message: Client does not have a license to connect to the server (Error= %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX failed to connect to the server (Error = %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX has recorded the following error - %2. Check Details.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised in the gateway transport
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX's gateway transport has recorded the following error - %2. Check Details.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised in the gateway transport
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: RDP Client ActiveX has started using RemoteFX for graphics decoding (decoder type = %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX is trying to connect to the server (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX has connected to the server

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the disconnection process
Event.Message: RDP ClientActiveX has been disconnected (Reason= %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: Connected to domain (%1) with session %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DomainName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: Server supports SSL = %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: Base64(SHA256(UserName)) is = %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: RDP Client build %1 %2 %3 %4 %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BuildBranch" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BuildDate" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BuildTime" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BuildVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ArchAndFlavour" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the disconnection process
Event.Message: Invalid format error occured when decoding packet of type %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This is a generic event that may be raised by the client.
Event.Message: Component name:%1, :: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This is a generic error that may be signaled by the client.
Event.Message: Component name:%1, :: %2, Error code:%3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This is a generic event that may be raised by the client.
Event.Message: Component name:%1, :: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: The client detected the link latency is %2 milliseconds.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: The client detected the bandwidth is %2 kbps/second.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: The client has initiated a multi-transport connection to the server %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: The client has established a multi-transport connection to the server.

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: The client failed to establish the multi-transport connection.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CustomLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the connection process
Event.Message: The multi-transport connection has been disconnected.

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when there is a close operation which will tear down the connection.
Event.Message: Close event, code = %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during the disconnection process
Event.Message: Disconnect trace:%1 "%2", Error code:%3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ComponentName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when the client has not been shutdown cleanly.
Event.Message: The RdClient has been forced exit since cancelling existing workspace job took too long.

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when the user tries to sign out from the OOB client.
Event.Message: The user has clicked sign out on the OOB Client ribbon.

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when the user manually tries to do feed refresh.
Event.Message: The user has clicked Refresh on the OOB client ribbon.

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when the user tries to login in ADAL page using different user name.
Event.Message: The user tried to login into ADAL with a different user name than the one he/she subscribed to initially.

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when a workspace event like subscribe/update succeeded.
Event.Message: %1: Workspace Event succeeded for Tenant = %2 , TotalTimeWithoutAdal = %3 ms, AdalTime = %4 ms. NumberOfResources = %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Event" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TenantId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TotalTimeWithoutAdal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AdalTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when a workspace event like subscribe/update failed!
Event.Message: %1: Workspace Event failed for Tenant = %2. , TotalTimeWithoutAdal = %3 ms, AdalTime = %4 ms. (Error code %5)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Event" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TenantId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TotalTimeWithoutAdal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AdalTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: RDP Client build %1 %2 %3 %4 %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BuildBranch" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BuildDate" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BuildTime" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BuildVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ArchAndFlavour" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when feed discovery succeeds
Event.Message: Feed discovery succeeded. TotalTimeWithoutAdal = %1 ms, AdalTime = %2 ms, NumberOfFeeds = %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TotalTimeWithoutAdal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AdalTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NumberOfFeeds" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when feed discovery failed!
Event.Message: Feed discovery failed. TotalTimeWithoutAdal = %1 ms, AdalTime = %2 ms. (Error code = %3)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TotalTimeWithoutAdal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AdalTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when the feed cache on the client local machine is missing icons or Rdp files due to cache corruption!
Event.Message: Feed cache corruption encountered. Tenant = %1, ResourceId = %2, ResourceType = %3, (Error code %4).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TenantId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResourceIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ResourceType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when user has successfully updated the consent status on server side
Event.Message: Consent status updated successfully. TotalTimeWithoutAdal = %1, AdalTime = %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TotalTimeWithoutAdal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AdalTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when user is unable to update the consent status on server!
Event.Message: Consent status update failed. TotalTimeWithoutAdal = %1, AdalTime = %2. (Error code %3)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TotalTimeWithoutAdal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AdalTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when the user manually clicks the view invitations button.
Event.Message: The user has clicked view invitations on the OOB client ribbon.

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when the user starts a new cycle of feed discovery. We log the hashed UPN and timezone information here
Event.Message: Base64(SHA256(UserName)) = %1, TimeZone Bias = %2, TimeZone Name = %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UserNameHash" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TimeZoneBias" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="TimeZoneName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when all the feeds of the user have been subscribed or updated completely. We log the overall time it took to download all feeds in parallel.
Event.Message: Refresh Time = %1, Number of feeds = %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="refreshTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="numberOfFeeds" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when there is error in acquiring ADAL token.
Event.Message: ADAL error code = %1, description = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when ADAL authentication token is successfully created.
Event.Message: ADAL token collected successfully

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when ADAL authentication is cancelled.
Event.Message: ADAL cancelled

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during a state transition.
Event.Message: %1 entering stage %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RadcClientType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RadcClientStage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during a state transition.
Event.Message: %1 with http event type %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RadcClientStage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RadcHttpEvent" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during a state transition.
Event.Message: %1 with http event type %2 and http status code %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RadcClientStage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RadcHttpEvent" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised during a state transition.
Event.Message: %1 with http event type %2 failed with xresult %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RadcClientStage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RadcHttpEvent" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Code" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when protocol caps are received from the server. We log the version selected, and the client mode and AVC capability.
Event.Message: The server is using version %1 of the RDP graphics protocol (client mode: %2, AVC available: %3).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Version" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ClientMode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AvcEnabled" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when protocol caps are received from the server. We log that hardware resources are being used.
Event.Message: The client is using hardware memory for the frame buffer.

Event.Opcode: This event is raised when protocol caps are received from the server. We log that hardware resources are not being used.
Event.Message: The client is using software memory for the frame buffer.

Event.Opcode: This event is raised if a pipeline error is encountered during execution. We log the faulting component, function, and error code.
Event.Message: The client encountered an issue while decoding and displaying RDP graphics (component: %1, function: %2, error code: %3)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Component" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Function" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
